title: SECL invites bids for 500 wind power projects off Gujarat coast
description: State-run Solar Energy Corporation of India (SECI) has invited bids for 500 wind power projects off Gujarat's coast, backed by viability gap funding. Successful bidders will sign a power purchase agreement at â‚¹4.5 per unit. This initiative is part of the Union government's plan to boost offshore wind energy under the National Offshore Wind Energy Policy.
